31.ara-name: كتاب الولاء والهبة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated that she wanted to buy Barrirah but (her owners) stipulated that they should have her Wala', so the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"The Wala' is for the one who gives the price, or for the one who grants the favor." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Ibn 'Umar and Abu Hurairah. This Hadith is Hasan Sahih, and this is acted upon according to the people of knowledge

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْوَلاَءَ لِمَنْ أَعْتَقَ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The Wala' Is For The One Who Frees
